com.soa.transport.http.deploy.impl

Class SimpleFilterRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.transport.http.deploy.impl.SimpleFilterRegistration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterRegistration

    public class SimpleFilterRegistration
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilterRegistration
    A simple implementation of FilterRegistration that can be used with an IoC framework.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.soa.transport.http.deploy.FilterRegistration

    • Method Detail

      • getDispatch

        public int getDispatch()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the dispatch flags that indicate at what point the filter should be inviked
        Specified by:
        getDispatch in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        An or'ed combination of the enumerated dispatch flags, DISPATCH_REQUEST, DISPATCH_FORWARD, DISPATCH_INCLUDE, DISPATCH_ERROR or the convenience definitions DISPATCH_DEFAULT or DISPATCH_ALL.

      • setDispatch

        public void setDispatch(int dispatch)

      • getServlet

        public java.lang.String getServlet()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the servlet mapping for the filter
        Specified by:
        getServlet in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        A servlet name for this filter. The filter will be applied to all requests directed to the named servlet, if it exists. If this is null and the path spec is null, the filter will be applied to all requests for the context.

      • setServlet

        public void setServlet(java.lang.String servlet)

      • getPathSpec

        public java.lang.String getPathSpec()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the path name mapping for the filter
        Specified by:
        getPathSpec in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        A path name spec for this filter. This may be null, in which case the assigned servlet mapping will be used. If both are null, this filter will be applied to all requests for the context.

      • setPathSpec

        public void setPathSpec(java.lang.String pathSpec)

      • getContext

        public java.lang.String getContext()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the root context that this filter belongs to. This allows the framework to associate the filter with a web application in scenarios where there may be multiple web applications deployed.
        Specified by:
        getContext in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        The string root context path for the web application that this filter belongs to. This may be null, in which case it is assumed to be "/".

      • setContext

        public void setContext(java.lang.String context)

      • getFilter

        public javax.servlet.Filter getFilter()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the filter
        Specified by:
        getFilter in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        The actual Filter instance that will be deployed. The Filter's init(FilterConfig) method will be invoked when the filter is initialized within the J2EE container.

      • getInitParameters

        public java.util.Map getInitParameters()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the filter's init params
        Specified by:
        getInitParameters in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        The init params for the filter. These will be passed to the Filter's init method when the filter is initialized in the container.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from interface: FilterRegistration
        Get the name of this Filter.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface FilterRegistration
        Returns:
        The filter name that will be used by the J2EE container
